item.title: Pawnship labour and mediation in colonial Osun division of southwestern Nigeria
item.description: Pawnship was both a credit system and an important source of labour in Yoruba land. item.title: Increasing participatory space in Zimbabwean local governance democracy
item.description: The purpose of this paper is to unpack the extent to which citizen participation has been enhanced in local governance in Zimbabwe. The paper points out that citizen participation in local governance have proved to be of significance to all decision-making processes.
